column4: i have a big issue... I tested Ubuntu LiveCD and i can get 1920x1200 resolution... Using the same xorg.conf i have black holes on the side of the screen... any ideas ???
??? u have on ubuntu xorg 1920x1200 and on Gentoo Linux not?
well im using the same xorg.conf from ubuntu
so without nvidia driver only the nv driver from xorg...u sure?
without trying out i can't say anything...thing is, i had both on my laptop and the two reacting the same
thats the reason xorg internal nv driver and nvidias running different DPIs
